column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
a brief narrative of the changes
About EC2 : Change the Payment options from On-Demand to Compute Savings Plans  1 year and change instance type to r5.xlarge
About S3 : Change S3 Standard storage from 1TB per month to 100 GB per month
